N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4009.22 - Pools dependent on entries

State Regulations

In all races except sweepstakes with five or more
separate entries that start, a racing association shall provide win, place and
show pools. In all races with four separate entries that start, a racing
association shall provide win and place pools and at such racing association's
option may conduct a show pool. In races of three separate entries, a racing
association shall provide a win pool and, at such racing association's option
may conduct a place pool. For two separate entries that start, a racing
association shall provide only a win pool. Pari-mutuel tickets shall be sold
accordingly; provided, however, that in sweepstakes with fewer than four
separate entries that start, a racing association may, at such racing
association's option, provide that there shall be no betting, and in such cases
an additional race with betting shall be added to the program, if
feasible. Notes
